item.description: Gérard Paligot Hi there! I’m Gérard Paligot, father of 2 little monsters and husband of an incredible woman. I’m a engineer enthusiast but I’m loving too Disney and everything in relation to space! I’m shy person but I’m working on it and became co-organizer of Lille Android User Group and French Android User Group to meet people and exchange with the mobile community! I’m currently working on two things: I’m leading Mobile Platform Engineering to standardize, improve and frame the practice of mobile.
